riskAlerts.text: The natural disaster in the Texan Hill Country is a tragedy. My prayers are with Texas. Rainmaker did not operate in the affected area...
riskAlerts.reason: Reply:like ratio 0.28 (threshold 0.15) — high controversy. Conspiracy keywords in replies. 1.5M views.

RainmakerCorp.bio: Next-gen cloud seeding for farms, ecosystems, and communities.

ADoricko.bio: "the face of Big Cloud". making it rain (and snow)

topMentions.text: @ADoricko's presentation at WaterTech Summit was outstanding. Rain Maker is solving a real problem with real science, not vaporware.
We deployed @RainmakerCorp's system across 3 counties. Early data: 15-20% rainfall increase in target zones. Cautiously optimistic.
Just visited @RainmakerCorp's demo site in Nevada — the results are genuinely impressive. Cloud seeding at this scale could be a game changer for western agriculture.
